website_summaries.verdict: Great for multi-level homes with a variety of flooring types.
pros: Two power levels for different carpet heights
Lightweight design makes it easy to carry up and down stairs
cons: Cord is only 30" long, so you will have to change outlets more often

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most disappointing purchases I have made. I bought this vacuum a year ago and this is the original bag...why? Because every month I have to do this. I have to take apart every component of the vacuum and clean everything out and the bag stays completely empty, everything gets trapped in the suction hose (there’s only one) and never even makes it to the bag. It WOULD be a great vacuum but it has not worked for me from right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Myzia

customer_reviews.title: Shaw recommended large wheels
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise, my Dyson Pet vacuum did not work on my newly purchased carpet from Shaw. Their recommendation was for soft cleaning. My Dyson's suction was not adjustable. Shaw recommended large wheels, adjustable brush heights and adjustable suction power. The Oreck Magnesium fit its' requirements so I purchased it online from Amazon. Since the Oreck was not from a dealership, I also purchased a 2 year warrenty for about $14. The Oreck is very lightweight, with a long cord, and is easily manuevered. The suction is gentle on the carpet but picks up all lint and dirt, The key is to sweep slowly. I am very happy with this Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: the beater brush thing is spinning fine..
customer_reviews.text: Twice. That's how many times I used it before it got stuck in an "auto shut off" loop. Probably about 15 mins of motor time. I was vacuuming a tiny bit of dog hair, it stopped, and now shuts off after a second, which is a protective feature, but it doesn't need protecting....there's nothing blocking it, the beater brush thing is spinning fine...I've vacuumed literally three specks of dust. Used twice and now it's off to the shop. Oh, and the construction looks like it costs literally $30 to make.....all super cheap plastic parts. $400 worth of junk.
customer_reviews.author: E. Medical

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and light to haul around.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought three of these through my years as a house cleaner. They are still the most powerful and lightest vacuum to haul around. Unfortunately, each new purchase of this model has found the durability and quality more lacking. My first magnesium took three years of frequent use; this last is starting to fall apart after just one year.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: moves easily and is able to reach under my furniture
customer_reviews.text: I have several models of Oreck vacuums and clean my home daily. Positives-this vacuum is extremely lightweight, moves easily and is able to reach under my furniture. Negatives-vacuum needs to be turned off to get from low to high setting, cord should be longer, and because it is so light minimal lines in my carpet. Sorry, I like the lines!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: Style over substance.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is light and yes it can go under just about any piece of furniture. What were the designers thinking when the put the on/off 2 speed button on the base! It takes two hands to switch speeds and to go from low to high you must shut the unit off! Button only goes from high to low to off to high. A significant design flaw in such an expensive machine. My 13 year old version has the speed adjustment built into the handle for one hand operation. The stupidity of the non friendly design of the Magnesium does not out weigh the fact that it works well. does a superior job and is Oreck quality
customer_reviews.author: RobbieBowtie

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum cleaner I've ever owned! I had a kirby and it didn't work well, it was super heavy, and I was constantly having to take it apart to cut hair off of the roller. This vacuum requires little care, rarely gets tangled in the rollers, and I love that it smoothly moves from surface to surface within my house. Great for a house with 5 girls and 2 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflykisses1781

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews a few years ago, I expected the best vacuum. Unfortunately, I had to return this two times due to 1. a fire from the motor. 2. the motor giving way and emitting smoke from the motor again. I will not be buying another Oreck as it is a danger to anyone owning one. Keep safe and do not buy one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome extremely lightweight powerful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Awesome extremely lightweight powerful vacuum. A bit noisy but that's to be expected with how light it is. This was bought for my elderly mother who has a torn rotator cuff and it is very easy for her to push and pull around. Definitely a high recommendation....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fan went bad and it is now at the Oreck store for ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 months in, the fan went bad and it is now at the Oreck store for repair. This is unfortunate as we intentionally spent more based upon their name and reputation whereas the Dyson we replaced was in its 7th year without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only cleaner to own
customer_reviews.text: Just got my sweeper today, I love it. It runs on it's own and you get a nice workout keeping up with it. With my bad back this sweeper is the one to buy, no pushing needed at all, and it is so light in weight even a child could use it.(That is if we could get our kids to do it) :) You won't be sorry in purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: sally Bicker

customer_reviews.title: Works on Thick Pile Carpets
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this adds anything but we recently had our house recarpeted with SmartStrand Silk carpet. It was a mistake, but we can't turn back the clock. This is the third vacuum cleaner we've bought trying to get one that will vacuum the carpet. The first two sucked so tightly to the carpet you almost couldn't move them. The Mohawk people recommended this model. It's certainly easier to push on the carpet, however we wonder whether it's cleaning the dirt from deep in the pile. We have no way to tell.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: easy to navigate
customer_reviews.text: It really is that light! It is plenty powerful, easy to navigate. I find it gets out all the dirt from our fairly thick carpet. It did push around some styrofoam pellets, but eventually it got them all.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight. Does well on wood floors as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Does well on wood floors as well as carpet.
customer_reviews.author: kim Q.

customer_reviews.title: Light and nimble
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum so much that I bought it twice. I had to leave my first one behind in a long distance move. So, when I got settled in new place, I bought again. It makes quick work of any carpet cleaning. It doesn't have a hose to clean upholstery/stairs, but that would add to bulk and weight.
customer_reviews.author: shileah

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum plugged up for no apparent reason, and caused damage to some of the parts. We do not have pets, and have a rather clean house. With warranty expired, Oreck was no help whatsoever. This is a very expensive piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Newman

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oreck, and the lightest. Worth the money. For anyone with back problems or arthritis this makes vacuuming much easier. Works great on all surfaces and picks up animal hair better than any vacuum I have ever had ,including the Oreck XL I had for years before this one.
customer_reviews.author: ridley's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot about this vacuum, like it's light weight and power. It is a bit loud. The on off switch is in a unfriendly place to reach. Make sure you use the low setting for small area mats, or it eats it. It will automatically turn off for this. Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this vacuum three times so far but am crazy about it. It is so light and easy to move around and does a good job on low to medium level carpets. The bags are really large so you do not have to replace them so often. I also like the low profile, it glides right under most furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Glover

customer_reviews.title: It does an excellent job and I love that it's so lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another Oreck that I had for years. It does an excellent job and I love that it's so lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: SusanG

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum I Have Found In YEARS! And So Light You Won't Believe It
customer_reviews.text: Really LOVE this vacuum! It was pricey, but worth it. It is so lightweight. I LOVE that you do not have to "manually adjust" for carpet pile .. you know .. the so-called easy slider for low-medium-high carpet that breaks your fingernails! This automatically adjusts itself for pile height, and you only have to push a button if switching to vinyl/laminate/hardwood flooring. We recently replaced carpet in entire house and I love this vacuum! Replacing bag is very easy too. It seems to lightweight to be a quality vacuum, especially for dog hair, but it works awesome! I have two dogs who shed A LOT (husky & aussie shepherd) and this vacuum has no problems keeping up with the hair.
customer_reviews.author: KLopez

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Works well on high pile carpets. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Roper2

customer_reviews.title: Great power in a light model
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my thumbs and wrists and this vacuum is light enough to carry in one hand, but does a fantastic job cleaning! I have always, before moving to this house, had central vac and this works even better than that!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay E.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, had it shipped to me a week ago,but some parts broke off.I had a new one shipped out as a replacement and I haven't had any trouble.It works great and I like my Oreck Magnesium SP!!!
customer_reviews.author: vacuumlover23

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vacuum. I returned one before it and stumbled upon this one -- and I'm SO glad it worked out that way. I was able to do the truest comparison to realize that this is truly the best vacuum. We have thick carpet throughout our house, and I needed the large wheels that would roll over it well, still get in there to suck everything out of the carpet, and beat the carpet enough without hurting it. Luckiest part is, this vacuum is ridiculously light for how powerful it is. I don't even care that I have to use bags with this. Come to think of it now, I never liked worrying about spilling the bagless containers anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Ultra light
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very light and easy to manuever. Makes vacuuming a breeze. Does a good job picking up dog hair and goes under most furniture well. No more nasty cups to empty or filters/belts to mess with. The 2 speeds work extra well when going from carpet to wood/tile flooring. The cord storage hooks are well spaced and actually big enough to hold the very long cord ! My other cleaner had too short a cord and always fell off the too small storage hooks. This is my second Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love my new vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Oreck. I have an old basic commercial XL for my basement. My upstairs XL did not work well on my new higher pile carpet. This is a dream. The lower setting for throw rugs is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: PZJPXZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is so light weight it makes vacuuming a breeze! The company shipped it fast and I am more than happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very nice one
customer_reviews.text: I order this from Amazon because the price was much better than our local Oreck dealer. I had a very old Oreck and thought was time for e new one. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Card

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaner, but no documentation in the box.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be a nice cleaner. Works well on our high pile carpet. I would give it 5 stars, however, there's no documentation in the box. No users guide and no warranty info ... therefore, -2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dvd

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Light, powerful, excellent on dog hair, small storage footprint! What's not to like? Edge cleaning is poor on HIGH but much improved on LOW. Excellent price on Amazon with quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: U READ 2

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vacuum, so light, great quality and gets under furniture well. Pricey but to me so far after a year+ of use it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Every!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Vacuum I ever owned. It is super light and has great suction. It is simple and easy to use. My only issue is a company like Oreck should stay "Made in America"...
customer_reviews.author: George from Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Most lightweight, pleasant vacuuming experience I've ever had. As someone who has dealt with some neck and back issues, I no longer dread vacuuming. Only wish there were a hose attachment.
customer_reviews.author: AReadingRad

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife, mother-in-law, and a friend
customer_reviews.text: My wife, mother-in-law, and a friend all love the Oreck Magnesium Upright Vacuum Cleaner. It's super light, powerful, and maneuvers easily. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Yosh Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Light enough to move freely, this vacuum does exactly what I want it to do. It goes smoothy under things and has good pickup power. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can haul it up and down stairs easily.
customer_reviews.author: gaillardia

customer_reviews.title: not your typical Oreck
customer_reviews.text: Besides not receiving it on time, it just doesn't work as well as other Orecks I have owned and this is my 5th. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. We have owned it for over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. We have owned it for over a year now and it works great. Very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: light
customer_reviews.text: When I received the reconditioned Oreck vacuum cleaner it was new. Great for a small place. I also purchased bags with it.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a hose attachments for this kind of price!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M Ruma

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!!!! Clogs way too much and no way to unclog unless you take it to the Oreck store. Inconvenient big time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best light weight vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Excellent job of picking up various dirt/hair. Don't like the location of the switch. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dudrey S.

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive the LW100 Magnesium. I received ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the LW100 Magnesium. I received the classic Oreck upright. Needed it immediately so kept the classic upright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough vacuum cleaner for the money. Pros: Very light weight Easy to manuver Easy to change the bag Two speed motor is useful for different surfaces Cons: Feels a little flimsy Doesn't get edges as well as I would like On-Off button and to change speeds is in an awkward location
customer_reviews.author: Bigbillyt

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only vacuum cleaner that I've found that will work on my Shaw Caress carpet (extremely plush carpeting). I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Lightweight, picks up great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Oreck vacuum cleaners, all of which have lasted a good time. This one is by far my favorite of all of them. The Magnesium is lightweight and pushes and pulls with ease. Can't say enough good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight and how well it does on thick soft carpet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & lightweight, easy to store and carry around the house.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great for the last 11 months but has now started to act up. It randomly switches off while using it. I would like to know what kind of warranty comes with it since it has not yet been a year since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: sashy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier! My wife is delighted! Our third Oreck vacuum, this is the best one yet: great power, quieter (2 speeds), lighter, and, most importantly, it works! We use it on ceramic tile, plush carpet and rugs -- and it gets it all! It's especially good with pet hairs, too. Lastly, it's so powerful that it is almost self-propelled!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter if we like it, but more importantly how does the maid like it. She does.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this vacuum. So light and so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fordice

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy for wonderful vaccuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for wonderful vaccuum cleaner. I really like the light weight, but power to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Brosemer

customer_reviews.title: Plush carpet's best friend
customer_reviews.text: After trying 3 Vacuums to clean my new plush carpet, I have finally found the winner!!! It has a slower speed to choose from, which is best for plush & soft carpet. Its extremely light weight, has a the longest cord ever, and vacuums like a dream. I can even store it under my bed! I've already told my kids that when they buy a house, they are getting one from me!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple product that works great.
customer_reviews.text: This product does one thing and does it very well. I like that – no complicated attachments. It has no adjustments that a user needs to make in order to go from carpet to bare floors. The only setting is the on/off switch that has three positions: on-max, on-low and off. The on-low is for vacuuming small carpets that you don't want sucked up by the power of the vacuum. It is super light and basically pulls itself across the floor. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Nimis

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum .. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible vacuum... I have kids and a dog...I generally keep the floors clean and would vacuum once everyday.. the insides of this machine are made of cheap plastic that is designed to break... don't waste your money.. my 6 year 60 dollar hoover cleans better and has lasted longer than this... so sad I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best deal for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: If you like their last model XXL you will love this one . More power ,less weight, can go under beds easily
customer_reviews.author: matthew roalofs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is terrific. Very powerful and extremely light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Our second Oreck. First one was still running after 15 years. We gave it away. We Like this one this very much. Negatives: it is pretty loud, as are all Orecks and it has no attachments. Positives: light weight, excellent suction and cleaning power, low profile for getting under things and very easy to maneuver. P.S. It looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Carbonari

customer_reviews.title: Oreck Magnesium Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and it picks up dog hair very well. the only problem I have is the cord is very long and I sometimes think there is to much cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Booth

customer_reviews.title: recommendTION
customer_reviews.text: I did recomend this product to one of my friends, and they looked for it and then they went with another brand because she was told ORECK was going out of businrss.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C Conway

customer_reviews.title: on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: on/off switch could be located nearer the handle with the slow speed being the first selection,unable to go from hard surface floor to carpet without first turning machine off.
customer_reviews.author: phil hickman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but they didn't make it with non-marring bumpers so on our white base boards I have go back and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Light weight, powerful easy to maneuver, have owned many vacuums, expensive highly rated vacuums, THIS one is the best!
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: New carpet new vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this light vacuum. I have a thick plush carpet and hitting the button twice makes it fluff the carpet without running the roller on the carpet to wear it out. I researched for quite a while and decided this was the best as recommended by several carpet companies and the Mohawk company.
customer_reviews.author: ingsurfnpb

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, works great
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and maneuverable, yet gets the job done. A nice replacement for our other much heavier vacuums and easy to carry up/down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael J Colaco

customer_reviews.title: Oreck Magnesium Upright Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great vacuum. Much quiter than our old Oreck which lasted 15 problem free years. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alan  Raymond

customer_reviews.title: light and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum, already had one at a beach house, loved it so much I bought these two - one for my Mom & one for our home
customer_reviews.author: kim swain

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY ORECK!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to hide, it picks up well, and most importantly it is easy to handle! I have tried small vacs before and this one is truly the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever for a senior citizen.
customer_reviews.text: This light weight vacuum is a God send for somone with a bad back, and can't lift much.... Thank you Oreck ! I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with its ability to vacuum high plush new carpet
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with its ability to vacuum high plush new carpet. Easy to use - don't like the fact that there is no retractable cord but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Emilie H.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Works like an Oreck! Its light, fast, and effective. For the money and for one who does not heed extensions and attachements this is the right choice. I tried the Dyson side by side for about a week and while impressed it was simply too heavy and big to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Cazzadich

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a Superior vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I am new with this oreck vacuum but, so far I have never enjoyed cleaning more!! So much that I recently ordered the Oreck hand vac with attachments!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Riani

customer_reviews.title: After the second vacuum broke I purchased a $59 vacuum at Walmart and it has lasted longer and works better than the Orecks
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was fooled by the marketing for the Oreck vacuums. I purchased two of this model over the course of two years, and both of them broke down after less than a year of use. Oreck vacuums are absolutely NOT worth their premium price. After the second vacuum broke I purchased a $59 vacuum at Walmart and it has lasted longer and works better than the Orecks. Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.author: Che Grinta

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace her 20+ year old Oreck. Very Light and easy to maneuver. Here's to the next 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ruhland

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back pain/hip muscle/etc.; I can use this light weight cleaner with less pull on my back. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum arrived in great time, and handles like a pro. It is light enough that it is great for more mature persons to operate!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Stapley

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Oreck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oreck. We replaced the first after using it about 9 years without complaint. The Magnesium is light weight, long cord, good suction, and easy to push; plus I love a bag so that I don't have to clean the cannister and dust isn't released into the house but stays in the bag. The only thing I miss is my last model had brushes on each side which gathered dust and the handles for the cord were higher. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boleyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazon prices not always the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Oreck Magnesium Upright vacuum on Amazon and with tax and shipping it was over $300. I thought I would get the free handheld vacuum with it but did not and if I wanted to own the handheld vac I would have to buy a refurbished one separately for over $100 making both over $400. Costco sells both for $279 has no shipping and that adds up to a tremendous savings of over $100. Buy wisely I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY HENSCHEID

customer_reviews.title: Met All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it.....has been an Oreck fan for years and this product did not disappoint her....very light and easy to use with very good suction....
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 year old oreck that still works and since I like it so much, I thought a new one would work even better. First time I used it I thought it was great -- light-weight and self propelled. I have pets and a lot of dog hair shredded bits of cloth toys and paper around the house. Second time I used it, it clogged up and now just spits dirt out rather than vacuuming it up. I'm going to have to take it apart to see if I can unclog it. Would definitely not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Westermann

customer_reviews.title: Oreck is the answer
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to maneuver. Terrific vacuum. I have relied on Oreck for more than 40 years and it has always done what it does perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: candydar

customer_reviews.title: We love the brand of Oreck vacuums
customer_reviews.text: We love the brand of Oreck vacuums !!! Have "tried" some of our Friends/Family's other brands and they just do NOT compare !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Herriott Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy/Great Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a gift for my newly married daughter. Her first new sweeper. She loves it. I have only good things to say about Orek Sweepers. I own two of them myself and have had very good luck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Scheller

customer_reviews.title: EASY OPERATION
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to operate with very little exertion. It has great suction and is very flexible to move underneath objects. My mother loves hers and after I tried it, I knew it was the vacuum for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cumpton

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight bagged
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. I've been searching for a light weight, bagged vacuum & this is it. Great suction on floors & rugs, I only need to use the low setting, not as noisy. Three dogs, picks up well along the edges.
customer_reviews.author: mark gardner

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight and works great, too.
customer_reviews.text: I have this vacuum and bought one for my daughter for Christmas. I love how light weight it is and like having a vacuum with bags as I never really liked the bagless ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Quirk

customer_reviews.title: i like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's easy to use, not heavy but is not that small that can go under the furnitures. I recommend this item for my friends it's a good product. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: sevianycosta

customer_reviews.title: The key to turn on and off is not working ...
customer_reviews.text: The key to turn on and off is not working or fail time to time how can i have that fix it, thanks
customer_reviews.author: lindolfo santos

customer_reviews.title: Oreck Magnesium is a winner
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and low profile allows it to go under furniture. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Smoking
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum worked OK the first time I used it. I have an ORECK at one of my other houses. That model is a few steps above this one. The next time I used it started smoking and smelled bad. Very disappointed in this item. I would definitely not buy this particular model again. I guess that old adage "you get what you pay for" was proven again.
customer_reviews.author: Jnezbo

customer_reviews.title: Oreck Magnesium  Upright Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this vacuum cleaner and have not been able to get n touch with Amazon to get instructions on howto return it. Can someone give me advise on how to do this?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kaupas

customer_reviews.title: Worst Vacuum. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally disappointed in this vacuum. The first time I used it- it worked GREAT. 2nd time- it worked okay, but got clogged inside (my guess because of a tight turn in the plastic hose). 3rd time- the carpet looks worse than before I vacuumed. The air intake vent gets clogged every time, the vacuum doesn't even remotely clean up to the wall, as a matter of fact, it leaves dirt streaks on the sides since the brush doesn't go all the way (or even close) to the edge. Here I was expecting all the hype of an Oreck to be true and it was not. I hate this thing.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Hoskam

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used a lot of different vacuums and this one is the best. When you unbox it you will say WTF, did I just buy a $300 toy? The base is not as wide as other Oreck vacuums, but the machine is very light and has extremely powerful suction.and its smaller size makes it very easy for vacuuming under and around furniture. I have two other uprights, but always grab this one. Drawbacks; cord is too stiff and location of power button is in odd place, but these are small faults compared to machines' performance.
customer_reviews.author: HMS Beagle

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite vacuum, but now this is the 2nd Oreck Magnesium I have purchased, and it broke just after the 1 year warranty. Super frustrating. Especially when I paid $400 for it. When it worked, it was the best. Sadly, I cannot endorse this anymore because this is the 2nd time this has happened and they want you to mail it to them at your cost, and then they charge you to fix it, and keep for about 2 weeks. And no local places in Michigan to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jean

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Oreck does NOT honor warranty if Vacuum purchased from Amazon. Pros - Wife loves the vacuum, light weight, worked great for 10 months. Cons - Sucked up a sock, got the blinking blue light, circuit board burned out. $50 repair, no warranty since I bought from Amazon. (Oreck at least did not charge me labor, which I would not pay for since I'm handy) Amazon needs to take down the warranty info for this product. Will I buy this again, probably, I'll buy whatever the wife likes. Buyer beware, no warranty if bought on amazon, go to their store and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Father of 7 kids

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly light weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum for my wife to use in our new home with a heavy thick carpet. It works perfect. The magnesium frame is super light weight eliminating the need for a self propelled, plus carries oreck quality. Two speed suction feature is also a nice addition allowing sweeper to conform well between hard and carpet surfaces. The only downfall of the vacuum would be the top portion of handle just above the bag. This part of the frame could stand to be beefed up more.
customer_reviews.author: duke

customer_reviews.title: I have mostly tile so it is fine to use as a broom
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Oreck vacuums. I am sorry to say that the quality has gone downhill. This one is just barely OK. I have mostly tile so it is fine to use as a broom. As far as carpet goes, it just does not cut it. I am very disappointed in this new one. I have a bad back so have to have something light or I would have sent it back. I have a different brand heavy vacuum that I use on my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible vacuum. There is a sharp curve in the tube just after the brush/roller, and as I have pets it clogs very frequently and is difficult to unclog due to that curve. I probably have to ask my fiancée to clean it out at least monthly because it won't work. Stick with the standard orecks, they are awesome. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: I gave a good review to the wrong vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I gave a good review to the wrong vacuum cleaner. The Oreck model U7010ECS was too heavy and too loud. This Oreck model LW100 is the one that is so light that I breeze through so fast. The only problem I have with it is that it is a bit loud. I use ear plugs and go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

product_meta.title: Oreck LW100 Magnesium SP Bagged Upright Vacuum
feature_bullets: 30 foot cord means fewer stops and speedier vacuuming. The on/off switch is under the handle. Best choice for plush, high-pile carpets and delicate surfaces
Constructed from incredibly durable magnesium, it delivers all of the strength and durability that you've come to expect in an Oreck vacuum.
Two speeds: high speed great for carpets, lower speed gentle enough for oriental and Persian rugs
HEPA inner bag captures at least 99.97% of particles at .3 microns from the air passing through it, including pollen, mold, dust and animal dander
Has received Carpet & Rug Institute Seal of Approval

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars346 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
